item.description:
Reception: Friday, June 27th, 2008, 7-10 pm
Eggroll Cafe in Lowell

The photographs are from David's 1998 visit to China, emphasizing the shapes, colors, and patterns found in Beijing, Shanghai, and Xi'an. This is a FREE event. If you are interested in carpooling or need a ride, please post a comment when you RSVP and I will organize this effort.

I know we have other Digital Arts members who are working artists with gallery showings. I encourage everyone to forward their own events to me, so I can post them on the calendar.

Hope to see you there!

For More Information:
Eggroll Cafe (978-970-3411)
110 University Ave, Lowell, MA

www.davidk.net/chinaphoto
www.eggrollcafe.com/news_events.html

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: China: Images by David Kelleher
